#summary High Level Overview of epiClock

= 3 Objects, Many Clocks =

epiClock is composed of three separate, yet equally important objects. 
  # face() - Manages the graphical front end of the epiClock
  # clock() - Contains a face() object, and manages the logic backend of the epiClock.
  # epiClock - Contains clock() objects, and manages all clocks on a page.
